website_summaries.verdict: A nicely priced digital camera in this category for basic trips and adventures.
pros: Comes with a variety of helpful, beginner-friendly features such as optical image stabilization, panorama shooting, and several image effects and filters
cons: The autofocus can take a few moments to resolve the image when photographing people and small objects

website_summaries.verdict: Simple features and an easy set up make this an option for someone wanting a straight-forward camera.
pros: A great price for a reliable camera with good quality
Features like panorama shooting, image stabilization, and advanced flash make this camera much more useful than expected for the price
Fun image picture effects (like "Toy Camera" and "Pop Color") add personality to photos
cons: A very simple camera that might not be worth the price unless this is what you want

customer_reviews.title: I am not a professional photographer so I was looking for something simple and good. I would buy this if you are looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to south america because I broke the camera on my galaxy phone. I am not a professional photographer so I was looking for something simple and good. I would buy this if you are looking for the same thing. The photos are all made with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.  Slow photo processing.
customer_reviews.text: Okay camera. I am really not happy with how long this camera takes to process a photo. It is incredibly slow. I took it on vacation and someone else on the trip had the same exact camera and has the same complaint. It takes a long time to process a photo before you can take another photo. I am using high capacity SD cards. I would not recommend this camera. I read the review before I bought this, and no one mentioned this fault.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGardener2015

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this camera! It is the only one she will use. She can take professional quality pictures just as good if not better than the professionals. Plus she can capture lighting bolts with the continuous shooting mode.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cross

customer_reviews.title: Used minimally and now has distortion with still shots
customer_reviews.text: So this camera could have lasted longer November 2015 - February 2018. We take pictures of inventory in our motorcycle shop. The camera was well taken care of and used about once every few months. A few weeks ago I noticed while taking still shots the image was distorted with lines going through them. I wiped the storage disk clean and reformatted it and I also reformatted the camera to factory settings. None of this helped. The camera is capable of taking panoramic photos, and video but not still shots. It's very strange. It was a decent little point and shoot for the cost but didn't hold up even with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty80Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It does not produce 20 megapixel resolution images
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I purchased this thinking it would be better than my iPhone SE for scanning large paper documents (construction drawings). Wrong. The camera does have a 20 megapixel sensor, but apparently the resolving power of the lens is only able to produce ~8 megapixel images. Yes, the files are in fact 20 megapixels, but they are so blurry that what you really have is an 8 megapixel image. I tried every setting, lighting, tripod, time delay, etc. Nothing works, and in fact my iPhone still took a better image, in-hand, than the camera on a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Small...Done!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert, so this is a good camera for me. I also hate reading a lot of directions, but that was no problem. This was easy enough to figure out between a bit of reading and a few minutes on YouTube. PROS: Easy to figure out, small as a deck of cards, has a lens protector, can look up more detailed directions online (for trouble-shooting); CONS: Doesn't come with a protective case, doesn't come with a memory card, a little on the slow side -but that doesn't bother me. It took Rembrandt a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: True-Review

customer_reviews.title: great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought his camera for my tech challenged parents who wanted a small easy to use camera for their vacations. There is a setting in the menu "easy" that they can leave and get automatically the best settings without them having to change much. There is also an easy slider botton that changes between photo, panorama and video... so far so good. The only downside is the battery life, I felt that they ran low fast. I bought a 2 pack and car charger in addition to the original items in the pack and that was perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesena

customer_reviews.title: ... camera is small and compact and the pictures are good. However
customer_reviews.text: The camera is small and compact and the pictures are good. However, it takes a very long time for the pictures to be taken. Whenever you need to take pictures quickly, this camera will fail an you end up with blurry pictures. I purchased the camera to capture my child in a competition and it took so long for the pictures to be taken I ended up not having any pictures of the event. This was so so disappointing. the person has to stay still for a long time for you to capture images. i even try adjusting the settings and this did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Small Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am 65 years old. This is my 3rd Sony camera. This camera is very very small. The first thing I did was drop it. Well fumble it on the desk, so nor harm done. Hard to press the tiny button that makes it take pictures. The thing I like the least is that I have to take off the tripod attachment on the bottom in order to get the memory card out to download the pictures. The older version I had was easier to use for that reason. You can charge it in a different way which I guess it a good thing. So far not sure I am in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: susieque

customer_reviews.title: but the quality of the photos is terrible. No matter what setting and different amounts of ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at numerous point and shoots for the last few months. The size and price of this item was the positive, but the quality of the photos is terrible. No matter what setting and different amounts of light, the clarity of the photos does not live up to even my smartphone camera.
customer_reviews.author: melissa c.

customer_reviews.title: not as good as a lumia 950 camera
customer_reviews.text: honestly, this is an o.k. camera. nothing too complicated, but not super user friendly either. too many options, which may or may not be a good thing for you. however, i find the camera on my microsoft lumia 950 blows this out of the water, especially with night pictures. it does take very sharp pics, but so does my lumia 950, and these days, i found my lumia brand new, although listed as refurbished on ebay for the same price as this camera, and thats also obviously a phone which i have on me everyday anyways. so, why need this? these types of cameras are becoming obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like that I had to find specific instructions online for the memory card (YouTube). However, the pictures are better than my android. I'm very happy with this camera. It's easy to learn, and I'd recommend it to anyone wanting a simple, inexpensive but decent camera. I purchased from amazon warehouse deals. Supposedly it had some "scratches" on the bottom. Didn't notice those. Great deal, though!
customer_reviews.author: FlowerBomb

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera DSCW830 1 MP-needs better directions for buying memory card that is NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. It's different than the last Sony we had. This one will take a little getting use to. It is very small, and the settings are different. we didn't realize the memory card didn't come with the camera, so you would be all set to take pictures on Christmas Day. NO we bought the 32 gig memory care along with a bag of goodies, and the case separately
customer_reviews.author: A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Ok!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Sony fan, but I felt like this camera was lacking the high quality pictures that are expected of Sony. It had basic features and wasn't anything special. I own several other Sony cameras and if I wouldn't have seen it for myself I would have thought this was an off brand. I was disappointed and maybe I got a bad camera, but I just think maybe they were trying to do cut corners and really wish they would have put more into making this one top quality like their other cameras. I have another brand with same specs and it outperforms this camera any day.
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera -- [UPDATE] it does "burst pictures" but not like an SLR would - meaning there is a slight pause after each picture as it processes the picture. You have to put it into that mode. It can do video, but I didn't get it for that. Good Value. Worth the money! I do also wish, as constructive criticism, that there was an intermediate setting between VGA and 5 MP. The pictures are either too small (150k) or too large (3 GB). So I take pictures in 5 MP mode and resize them on my desktop computer. I don't need the detail like some people demand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime??

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't good
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality for point and shoot. There was also a delay between taking pics and delay focusing. I think there is something wrong with mine so I sent it back. Not sure if anyone else had these issues.
customer_reviews.author: kabs996

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pix
customer_reviews.text: Great quality pix. Buy about 5 extra 'N' type I think batteries along with an extra charger or two and you will be able to take pix all day with power on all the time (have a 64 gig card in it never vaguely near filling it up, have taken 2200 pix in one day at various places / shows. you can mix/match pictures with high quality video. power it on connected to your PC and you can copy pix from the camera's disk drive letter that appears.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Terra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Quickly shipped. I recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Quickly shipped. I recommend this seller. The camera takes great pictures. I bought it again (had one 3 years ago) because the image stabilization is terrific. It's light, easy to carry in your pocket, and the pictures are MUCH BETTER than the camera that is in my phone. Also, all you need to do is connect the USB cord to your computer, and using regular Windows file explorer you can upload all the pictures in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Lary CrewsTop Contributor: Writing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. I bought the first one for myself ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. I bought the first one for myself a week before an Alaska excursion and cruise. Photos and videos were excellent. It is small and was easy to carry and easy to use. The second was for my husband per his request. The next two were Christmas gifts for our grandchildren ages 5 and 8. They both take good pictures consistently of their achievements and fun activities.
customer_reviews.author: Just Read

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design, Easy to Use, Tech is A Few Years Old
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed camera and good value for the price. Simple, intuitive controls. Easy directions. Decent size screen. Zoom works well. Auto focus is excellent. Includes the charger. Drawbacks are NTSC and PAL for video output. No HDMI option. No Wi-Fi or Wi-Fi Direct capabilities. Images take a few seconds to appear after pushing the shutter button. Image quality was decent, but no higher quality than our Samsung Galaxy S6 and S7 phones. Zoom images were about the same quality as the phone. So, if you have a nice smart phone, this camera won't offer much additional. If you wanted a stand alone pocket camera, this is a fine choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Corners Cut Compared to Previous Model
customer_reviews.text: The slow auto-focus, constant blur, unpredictable light changes, and the display have me really annoyed. I have an older model of this camera which is much better and creates sharper more accurate images, albeit less pixels. The body and size on this overall feels a lot cheaper than the older model. The video isn't all that great either. I feel like some serious corners were cut with this and it was assumed no one would notice. The only difference so far that seems to be a real plus is the battery life. Seriously though, the display is killing me; the colors are nowhere near accurate and it looks no better than a circa 2003 display.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella Proffer-Vendetta

customer_reviews.title: Packaged for European Sale
customer_reviews.text: The camera seemed fine, although I never got to use it. If you are purchasing this camera from Phototech, please be aware that the camera is packaged for European sale (that is, the battery charger comes with a European AC plug rather than a US AC plug). Nothing in the product description notes this fact. US customers must either return the camera or purchase an after-market European to US AC adapter.
customer_reviews.author: JS Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal With Price Drop
customer_reviews.text: Handy little camera that's easy to use. I was surprised at the fine quality of the video. Makes posting videos on YouTube a snap. Now with the price drop it's a good deal. Only problem is with the charging cable, it's only 2 feet long with a dedicated plug. Amazon sells a 6 foot cable listed as "ABC Products Replacement Sony Alpha / Cybershot USB Cable Cord Lead (For Image Transfer / Battery Charger" that is a perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hubers

customer_reviews.title: Nice point & shoot!
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to no eye hole viewer and all the automatic stuff. Wish it came with instruction book rather than on line. Internet not always available. Great little point & shoot camera. One word of caution, don't drop it! I had one in my shirt pocket, bent over and it fell out and quit working - lc screen was shot. I ordered another one, that tells you something!
customer_reviews.author: James E. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact camera - but maybe not as good as former models using the same format.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace a DSC-W690. The menu format is the same as the DSC-W690, however, the camera is significantly smaller, and the zoom clarity proved inferior to the DSC-W690 in a side by side comparison. The zoom discolored low light pretty dramatically. I returned this camera & opted for the DSC-W690 instead. But this camera does function smoothly. It is really designed for a small hand. Bottom line is I missed the W690 so much I decided to return this more recent version of it. Better zoom, better clarity and color rendering in the W690.
customer_reviews.author: JT on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sony DSCW830, I abused the first one carrying it around in my pocket unprotected. The first one developed a shadow across the print face but I liked the camera enough to buy again. This camera is easy on batteries, I've never run the battery down to empty. It is a point and shoot, it takes a few seconds to auto adjust the focus but it is a 120 USD camera so it is to be expected. Picture quality is about what you get for a hundred and twenty dollars, good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Takes Great Pix
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of Phone Pictures, and we travel quite a bit. I wanted something that was easy to carry (Fits in your pocket), takes great pictures and is easy to change either the battery or the chip. This camera has everything going for it. Picture quality is great and the battery lasts a long time. I purchased two extra batteries and a separate charger. That has worked perfectly. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mizunoman

customer_reviews.title: It Survived -
customer_reviews.text: If your are looking for a small Camera ,with a German Zeiss Lens, that takes really good pictures ,for under $150,this is the only one. I spent 16 days in The Galapagos Islands ,and the "Nasty" (So hot ,humid, rains all the time). The Amazon Jungle Rainforest. It was so bad ,I thought my Camera would stop working. But it survived just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Byron  Alton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot camera, even for pros!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur photographer and was looking for a compact camera, but one with nice features. This camera satisfies both needs! At 20 megapixel, you'll get great quality shots, and 8x zoom lets you get close to the action. It seems to work good in low light and has awesome auto focus. This is my second Cyber Shot. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: HCC

customer_reviews.title: Sony DCS-W830 Is Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The Sony DCS-W830 Is much smaller than I expected but I'm happy with its size. It's smaller than an Apple 8 iphone and fits nicely in my shirt pocket/pants pocket. Lightweight... Sturdy Body... Well made. Takes pictures comparable to any cell phone and the zoom is about the same. Battery life can be better, but since it's a small phone, it's a small battery. I would suggest purchasing a couple more batteries as backup. Overall, I give it a solid 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Screen too tiny
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Easy assembly. Could not tell if photo subjects were in focus window is so tiny. I don't use glasses but would need readers to take any photo and to see the photo on recall. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: l bough this camera new it would not work so ...
customer_reviews.text: l bough this camera new it would not work so i sent it to sony repair it could not be fixed so they sent me another one that one was broke also i am out 118.00 i can not get sony on the phone. so far no camera no money.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Z.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the small size which easily fit in my pockets ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera with me to Israel to get shots of the Holy Land that I could blow up if I wanted to. Loved the small size which easily fit in my pockets so it was with me all the time, though it does takes a bit to power up to be ready to take a picture. Battery life was more than adequate and there were more photo options than you might expect on such a compact camera. Very pleased with the quality of the images captured. This Sony delivered high quality shots and others have raved about the optics of the lens. I was quite delighted with this little gem.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't last 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed; the camera is small and decently easy to use for someone like your grandma; but the battery won't last even few hours of usage, without even use the flash. The image quality is OK; on par with other cameras in the same price range; but the battery life is very short; making this impossible to use for more than 20-30 pictures and few videos. Beware if you are buying it, that the battery has to be charged constantly.
customer_reviews.author: CFTop Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: I had a camera from Sony that looked identical (W650) ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a camera from Sony that looked identical (W650), which worked very well, but broke by accident. So, I needed portable Sony with Zeiss lens. This camera meets most of the expectations, except one- the speed. I've got many not focused pictures and some, which are just late. There is no manual included (I found it at manualslib.com) and there is many adjustments, which is time consuming to try. So, the camera is just little slow for now, but works right otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MariyV

customer_reviews.title: Great, small camera
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really love our cameras. We bought one for each of us to take on vacation. They are small, lightweight, and take great pictures. The resolution of the picture is better than what you see on the viewfinder, although the viewfinder is good quality too. They are also very reasonably priced for the quality of product you get. When we are out and about, I tend to leave my camera out of the case in my bag so I can pull it out quickly and take pictures. It has been durable despite the abuse, and we've had no problem whatsoever with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, small - pocket sized camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm a real estate appraiser and it works good for both inside and outside pics. -Good battery life, -Good photos, -Does not take aa or aaa batteries. I bought two extra batteries and a wall charger. -Panorama feature forces you to take a complete 180 degree pic... In other words - you can not stop the camera mid-panorama like I can do with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: KC_COLO

customer_reviews.title: Eh?
customer_reviews.text: Almost a "Kiddie" Camera. Slow save rate (even though I have one of the fastest memory cards available). Takes some Great pictures, takes some 'ok' pictures, takes some bad ones. All in the same light conditions. Strange. BUT, I bought it as a backup camera and to have a zoom better than my phone. My samsung takes consistently better pictures. The 8x optical zoom works well. So i am underwhelmed, but given the price, i'm giving it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williams

customer_reviews.title: DIFFICULTY DOWNLOADING PICTURES TO MY COMPUTER
customer_reviews.text: Camera seems to take good pictures (at least the best I can tell by looking at the screen on the camera). But I have the hardest time to download the pictures to my computer using the cord that was provided. Tried on both my desktop and the laptop. Have been working on it for the last couple of days but no luck. I have owned several digital cameras in the past and never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Travels well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera specially for a trip across Europe, where space was at a premium, so I didn't want to carry a SLR. The Cybershot did an outstanding job, even after being dropped a couple of times. I took about 2000 pictures using it. I will take it again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: James Hearley

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: My long loved digital camera and its case were failing. This replacement is great! (I always buy last year's models to save money). Got for a good price. Had to study the manual for a bit to understand and set options. Paired it with HDE Neoprene Case for Sony Cyber-Shot Digital Cameras.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good but IT IS PLASTIC now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but IT IS PLASTIC now - I have had a ton of Sony cameras and the plastic (hard plastic) casing was a downer. Not sure it will live if it drops. Shutter speed is a bit slow but most in this price range are. Still and all this is a better camera than most that are similar to it.
customer_reviews.author: PokemomTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: A picture worth a thousand words
customer_reviews.text: ok, first, the picture with this review is from my iPhone because it takes better pictures than this hunk of junk. I'm tired of having to make changes in the menu EVERY SINGLE TIME I TURN IT ON!! For all that is holy can you just save the dang settings??? Pictures are fuzzy, it says it's focused but no.... It won't turn on when you push the button (sometimes) It will randomly turn off I threw it in a river.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis D. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's not gonna replace my "big" cameras, but this has become my "take it everywhere" camera. It is 3.7 inches long, 2 inches high and a bit more than a half inch thick. It weighs about as much as a pack of gum, yet it shoots 20mp, has an 8X optical zoom, a Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens and uses standard SDHC memory cards. In "P" mode you have full control over ISO, White Balance, Focus, Metering and more (though no manual mode). You never notice it in your pocket. $99 at Amazon. Amazing, and highly recommended! I can't get over the price...
customer_reviews.author: David Booker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It is a super practical camera! the photos have excellent definision and real carl zeiss color. I recommend this product, I have compared its definition and color with my lumix zs10 (16x hd) and it has the same resolution. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lisandro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and so compact!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought a bigger camera with more features for my daughter, and then decided to give her the choice between that camera and this one. She picked this one! She prefers the smaller size, but she did try both out to compare photo quality. This camera actually had truer colors than the other one did. It was also easier for her to operate. So, now I'm packing up the other camera and returning it. This camera will serve my daughter well and the fact that it's so compact just can't be beat! It's a great value and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: jawhite

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I know this is not an expensive camera so I'm not dinging it for picture quality. It is good enough for the price point. What drives me insane is it's inability to stay in focus. Anytime I am taking video it randomly but often decides to go out of focus 10-20 seconds in and will not regain focus.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the price. Was not looking for a camera for professional use. just something the wife and I could use for vacations and family events. Small enough to fit in a shirt pocket . Simple to use and has many nice features usually found on more expensive units. If your looking for a small camera that takes great pictures, you could hardly go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Not MAC comparable. Seems like a stupid limitation to not mention
customer_reviews.text: The camera seems fine, but the item description should clearly state "WARNING, THIS CAMERA WILL NOT DOWNLOAD PICTURES TO A MAC". I couldn't even assess the camera because of this limitation. Sony dropped the ball because this looked like it would be a great camera (I'm returning it tho, so I'll never know)
customer_reviews.author: Steven A

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera! It's just what I was looking for. It takes great photos and is easy to operate....so far. It's small and fits anywhere. I'm not a photographer so I was just looking for a little point and shoot I could use.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyWTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not for closeup shots
customer_reviews.text: This camera is initially focused so far away you always have to zoom way out to get say a bird or plant pic. Probably OK for Mt Rushmore photos but little else closer up. I gave it 5 stars for zoom, autofocus and image stabilization, they work good, but seeing closer than 20 feet away without zooming is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Micke

customer_reviews.title: Not good focus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I loved my old one that was supposed to be just like this one. Focus is not good at all. I can't get an unblurred shot unless my subject is completely still. Pretty disappointed with that. Still shots turn out good though.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: For the price OK
customer_reviews.text: The camera did as it should, but the results was often blurry pictures. I take a lot of pictures at music shows. I was very rarely able to get a crisp shot. Videos were OK. I'm spoiled form my previous RX-100, so maybe my expectation were tainted.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff L.

customer_reviews.title: Wish the LCD was more clear for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This Sony takes good pictures but I just wish that for the price Sony would have used a better LCD screen. I mean my cheap no name camera had a better LCD display. I mean I understand it's more of an entry camera but this is Sony not some cheap brand. This camera was for my mother but I guess I was expecting it to be similar to my own Sony.
customer_reviews.author: VicThor

customer_reviews.title: How slow can you go?
customer_reviews.text: The shutter speed on this camera is sooooo slow. Turning it on & getting it to focus are painfully slow. Hope you don't want to take another picture right away, because you are likely to miss your chance due to the extended wait time between taking a picture and the camera being ready to take the next photo. Photo quality is ok. The slowness of the camera is just extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: takes very bland pictures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months ago when I was going on a vacation to replace my Canon Sure Shot. I wanted something that was smaller and with higher resolution and zoom. I chose this camera because my first digital camera was a Sony and it took great photos (much better than the Canon I had replaced it with). Well... out of the three digital cameras I have owned this one definitely takes the lowest quality pictures. The pictures seem slightly out of focus, and the colors are bland and not at all vibrant. My iPhone takes much better pictures than this camera!
customer_reviews.author: David Vinson

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with the quality of this camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Scotland. I was very disappointed with the quality of this camera. Landscape photos turned out blurry along the perimeter of the photo and semi clear towards the middle. We eventually gave up on this camera and just started using our phone to take pictures since the phone quality was better. The build quality of this camera also felt very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: What you get is a fantastic small lens and a great sensor in a camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Many conflicted reviews of this camera, but you have to keep in mind the price point and what you get. What you get is a fantastic small lens and a great sensor in a camera that takes really high quality photos under many, if not most, conditions. Of course it lacks the features and capabilities of larger, more expensive cameras, but for what it is and what it costs, this is an excellent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: NO CHARGER CABLE AND DIFFICULT ON/OFF SWITCH
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is okay. I had 2 major complaints. 1. It came to me with NO way to charge it - no cable, no charger unit, nothing. This was frustrating over the holidays, I finally used a cable my mother-in-law had to wrap up Christmas, but once I got home I was needy again. 2. The on/off switch is SUPER FRUSTRATING! It will not come on unless you press down hard on the ON/OFF button for a little while. That makes quickie photos IMPOSSIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Usrey

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a small but powerful camera. It fits in my small purse and is practically weightless. When I need pictures for my art designs I would rather use a camera than my cell phone so this camera is great for those times I don't have my large digital camera with me.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Clear photos, point-and-shoot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this refurbished, and so far so good. I have taken some indoor and some outdoor photos and so far they are clear. The camera focuses quickly. I haven't had it that long but the battery hasn't run down yet. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: I went to Best Buy and a nice young man spelled it all ...
customer_reviews.text: It was disappointing that there was no manual with this, and while it can be downloaded (for a fee) it involves several hundred pages. Not what I will be doing any time soon. I went to Best Buy and a nice young man spelled it all out for me, taking time to show me exactly how to use all the features even though it was not purchased there. I did buy the memory stick and a case from him because he was so helpful. This is an upgrade of a camera I had for several years and I expect the same good results from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dar D.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Pocket Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Camera to replace an early version, over 8 years old. Twice the features plus more than double the megapixels and half the price of my older pocket Camera. Easy to use, easy to stick in your pocket, and GREAT pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Shade

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This little camera makes it convenient to take pictures but has limitations on flash and focus. In general it does what it was meant to do and should not be expected to take professional or near professional quality photos. Action photos are not to be expected either as everything ends up a blur..
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Great pics
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the camera was so easy to use and also so portable. It easily fit in my pocket. The videos and photos were pretty good, but I got the camera too close before my trip, so I didn't know how to zoom yet! That would have felt better. But that's me not the camera! It definitely takes better pics than my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Literally garbage....
customer_reviews.text: The screen is super flimsy. It's literally junk. ALL images are blurry, focus is crap. I would return it, but somehow being inside of my pocket broke the screen. Screen still works, but its cracked and has a blacked out area now. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Quillson

customer_reviews.title: ... time abroad and it was an okay camera - like it took decent photos - but there were a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for my time abroad and it was an okay camera - like it took decent photos - but there were a good amount of times when my old iphone took better pictures (of the same scene...). If I could go back, I would definitely have passed on this camera and saved up more money to buy a better camera instead.
customer_reviews.author: KtC3312

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera. I bought it for my wife for ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. I bought it for my wife for Christmas and she almost seems like it grew from her hand. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: This newer model is great. I had purchased a Canon Elf first and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to replace an older model that I have had for years that I have dropped too many times on the concrete. This newer model is great. I had purchased a Canon Elf first and I hated it. This is a great little camera that I carry on my motorcycle or kayak and it always delivers great pictures. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hanshew

customer_reviews.title: still not quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: ordered the camera last month and discovered after downloading photos that there appeared to be a "black smudge" in the upper left corner of each picture. I returned the camera this week and have already received a replacement, but noticed that there is a shadow (pink-colored) in the view finder when taking pictures. As yet, I have not confirmed that this shows up in the final pictures, but am disappointed that I'm still having some issues with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had Sony cameras before and this one is pretty easy to use (to me). This was purchased for a friend and I showed him the settings etc. The simple auto setting only went up to a 5mp image which is likely why some people were getting poor shots. Its not as simple as an emtry level camera could be, but it also does more than it would seem at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new camera and this one was reasonably priced and affordable. It may not be a Nixon or a Canon, but it gets the job done and takes quality pictures for someone like me who really doesn't know that much about cameras. My husband knows a lot more about cameras and really wanted to get a fancier one, but I like simple and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Keene Family

customer_reviews.title: Worse lag time I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: There is a 3-4 second lag time between when you actually shoot the photo and it takes it. I usually take bursts of photos and this is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Nice little point and shoot camera with the resolution to give my pics on Ebay a nice crisp look. Camera phones only go so far this is so much better quality.Shipping was extremely quick and packing was fine. I downloaded the guide from Sony online and am good to go.
customer_reviews.author: kris stadelman

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: This little camera packs a big punch. I'm a Realtor and I wanted something small and I don't count on my phone for photos. I have used this several times and have yet to have 1 bad picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Ruby

customer_reviews.title: BEAM ME UP SCOTTY!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera...it arrived on time and well packaged. Supplier did a good job on everything including the price. Been using it to get photos of the gators behind my house. The female has a new litter of 6. Great camera and good speeds. I replaced my 10 mp camera with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The perfect every-day or emergency camera when quality just might be important.
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is the perfect camera: a grab-point-shoot, with great resolution for any use, including the option to better crop hasty shots and still have plenty of pixel resolution for posting or printing. I like that I carry it in my pocket and even forget it is there. Camera phones then to be too jittery and although lighter, cameras are more difficult to hold steady than this Sony. A final feather in this bonnet is the name: Sony has meant qualty for a billion years, give or take a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: James I dahle

customer_reviews.title: Just love it, it is the same as I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Just love it, it is the same as I have that I actually broke and I couldn't have it fixed , I didn't know what I would do with out it, and I never thought I would ever find exactly what I had. What can I say, It just saved me,
customer_reviews.author: mjbear7

customer_reviews.title: Sleek camera!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put it to use much yet, other than just messing around with some of the features while taking silly photos...but I love it already! It's small and discrete...I like that it's black so I'm not pulling out some outrageous pink camera anywhere... I can't wait to take it with me on my "no phones allowed" camping trip! I'm sure it'll take great pictures. --- I will add that it doesn't come with a case or a memory card, but it wasn't too much extra to add those to the shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Herman

customer_reviews.title: If this were a more expensive camera, I would return it.
customer_reviews.text: The camera seems OK, but the light that is supposed to indicate it is charging does not come on. The seller claims they do not do "trouble shooting", as if somehow the light can be made to come on, so they said I should contact Sony. I don't see the point in exchanging the camera, since another one might have worse problems. Perhaps there is a quality control issue here.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: poor panoramics
customer_reviews.text: Panoramic pictures are very tough to capture well. Despite how slow and steady I thought I was, the capture would fail. Those panoramics that did capture would often have bad areas of duplication.
customer_reviews.author: elma

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera, with plenty of functionality. The one downside is the pictures seem a bit on the fuzzy side. I chalk this up to an image stabilization problem, but the pictures are good if I can get really still. A higher-priced smart phone would probably take better pics, but I like Sony and their products, so I'll probably stick with this.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my little camera. I keep it in my purse for those moments when you wish you had a camera. It takes good, detailed pictures. The one drawback for me is that it will not take the kind of close up pictures I occasionally need. If I stand back and use the zoom, it struggles sometimes to find the focus. It occasionally takes accidental pictures of the inside of my pocket, the ceiling, or the floor, but I chalk that up to my own random pressing of the button.
customer_reviews.author: TNQuilter

customer_reviews.title: No more blurry pictures. A great camera at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: A truly awesome camera. I have a medical condition that makes my hands shaky. I am trying to take pictures of items I am selling, but the pictures came out so blurry, they were unusable. I was very frustrated. Whit this Sony camera with "Optical Steady Shot image Stabilization" I can take good picture again. Most of my pictures are not only clearer, but many of my pictures bring out amazing details. I could not begin to talk about the many other features, a truly great camera at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good camera
customer_reviews.text: Never worked well. Very disappointed. Pictures blurry unless pictures taken outdoors. I tryed reading the manual and trying different settings. Still blurry. Ended up buying another camera. I've had this type of camera before and it was good. I should have asked for a refund right away but didn't. I think this camera was broken inside.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a top line SLR but for taking a nice little camera you can put in your pockt its great
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a Nikon I had. I had lots of issues with the Nikon cool shots. I decided to go to a sony. Seems like a good camera. Had if for a while now and its good easy to use. Much like the cool shots.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: The best camera for the cheapest price you can find
customer_reviews.text: The best camera for the cheapest price you can find! Have two! Zeiss lense's will get good pictures from the bottom of a bottle of beer!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence R. Dotson49

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father because it was small & easy to use. Takes great photos. He loves it, so I'm happy. Only complaint is that it's NOT a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Milo

customer_reviews.title: If I were you I would look elsewhere....
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom for her birthday. It takes to long to even take the picture and it comes out blurry. Image trying to take a 10 second picture of a dog or baby that moves every 2 seconds. Doesn’t turn out so pretty. The quality could be way better.
customer_reviews.author: Camille C.

customer_reviews.title: i like sony cameras
customer_reviews.text: i like sony cameras , like that it is small , offers panoramic, movie 720p and USB for charging. There is a few second delay every time i click which is somewhat annoying but most times the shot is OK. Haven't worked out the 'continuous' yet? I think this will work for me for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: tris

customer_reviews.title: Sony pocket cam
customer_reviews.text: Great pocket and travel camera. Excellent Zeiss lens. Zoom is slow as is focus. It is not great for action shots. Still shooting is excellent. Bought travel case and extra batteries and charger for traveling for less than $15. Now just need to travel!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera, great pictures. Still trying to learn all to the features, but do far it's easy to use and takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Derryberry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Used it all day 4th of July and then took it on a 10-day vacation and, after charging it initially, I only had to charge it one time. Got the SanDisk 32GB card to go with it & took at least 200 photos and all turned out perfectly. Very easy to use - can snap pictures with one hand and they are easy to download to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: M Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. It’s easy enough for him when he’s on the road by himself. He’s very happy with the pictures and can upload them into his laptop without any problems. Definitely a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: One issue is thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is wonderful! But...... don't expect to come home & put the memory card in your computer to download the photos. Sony does not do that. You'll have to go to CVS to print them or get a CD. If you are like us & want to post them right away on facebook or other social media, buy a KODAK. Otherwise it takes grrrrr8 pictures!
customer_reviews.author: M. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Blurry pictures
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a cheap camera to bring along to Disneyland. Sometimes the pictures turn out great, but it seems like most of them are blurry. I loved its small size, but it's not one I'd invest in for important pictures.
customer_reviews.author: bookmom

customer_reviews.title: grandchild likes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughters 12th birthday. Chose sony due to the reliability history I have had with their products. My granddaughter quickly learned how to operate and rechargeable battery lasted for numerous pictures. The 20.1 mp rating is a plus. Another plus is the ability to recharge the battery without removing it from the camera. The 8 times zoom is nice, but not very practical over about 6 times.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: This camera is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I still need to learn how to use it but I took it with on a train trip from LA to Seattle and took great pictures thru the window moving. I am so glad I had it. Now I just need how to use it better. I also to the extra sd card.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work after one month
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product I bought the refurbished one any quit working after one month this way you can see this product you sold on Amazon most of them are refurbished
customer_reviews.author: Aniruth sharma

customer_reviews.title: which is great for those who don't like carrying a big camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small camera, probably the smallest I have seen, which is great for those who don't like carrying a big camera with them. The picture quality was not the best when seen it on the camera, but the image looks better when seen on the computer. I gifted it to my dad who loves small cameras and is not concerned too much about the resolution of the image. I will possibly buy a new one that shoots a better quality of pictures even if it is a bigger size. The 20.1 MP really does not add much to the picture quality as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paolita

product_meta.title: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Style:Only CameraIt's the amazingly easy-to-use camera that slips right in your pocket-with an 8x optical zoom 20 1MP photos and beautifully-detailed HD videos And pics stay clearer even with shaky hands thanks to optical steady shot image stabilization You can also enhance your images with built-in effects that adjust skin tone and texture or even whiten teeth

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


CYBER-SHOT DIGITAL CAMERA W830
It’s the amazingly easy-to-use camera that slips right in your pocket—with an 8x optical zoom, 20.1MP photos and beautifully-detailed HD videos. And pics stay clearer, even with shaky hands thanks to Optical SteadyShot image stabilization. You can also enhance your images with built-in effects that adjust skin tone and texture or even whiten teeth.

20.1 MEGAPIXEL PLUS 8X ZOOM
A powerful 20.1 megapixel CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 20.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19”) size, or crop your images and still come away with high resolution shots. The 8x zoom Carl Zeiss Vario Tessar lens helps you get much closer to your subjects.

OPTICAL STEADYSHOT IMAGE STABILIZATION WITH 2-WAY ACTIVE MODE
Sony's Active Mode image stabilization gives you the freedom to shoot movies even while walking or running. 2-way Active Mode corrects for both vertical and horizontal motion.

720P MP4 HD MOVIE MODE
In 720p MP4 movie mode the camera shoots 1280 x 720 high definition movies at 30 fps, a standard format when working with a PC.¹ Create high quality movies with full use of optical zoom in files small enough to transfer to compatible PC or Mac computer. Once transferred to your computer and connected to the internet, you can effortlessly upload your media to popular photo and video-sharing websites such as Photobucket and YouTube.

CREATIVE SHOOTING WITH PICTURE AND BEAUTY EFFECTS
Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Beauty Effects allows edits to skin tones, skin smoothing, shine removal, eye widening, and teeth whitening. Beauty Effects can be combined to further enhance the image.

ADVANCED FLASH ILLUMINATES DISTANT SUBJECTS
Advanced Flash allows you to shoot bright, beautifully lit photos. The built in flash reaches farther resulting in brighter subjects in dimly lit rooms or outdoors in the evening.

INTELLIGENT AUTO MODE
Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, faces, and adjusts settings resulting in clear images, faces with natural skin tone and less blur. Take advantage of all the technology without leaving Auto mode. Kids on the playground, landscape shots, a beautiful flower or an indoor birthday party; all result in clear images without leaving auto mode.

SWEEP PANORAMA MODE (UP TO 360°)
Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama mode. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the camera can take a variety of panoramic shots. Now capturing wide landscapes is as easy as press and sweep.

FACE DETECTION TECHNOLOGY
Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends.

SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY
Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting.

2.7” (230K DOTS) CLEAR PHOTO LCD DISPLAY
Generous 2.7” (230K dots) Clear Photo LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

 * Imaging Sensor:1/2.3" Super HAD CCD Sensor
 * Processor:BIONZ
 * Pixel Gross:20.5MP

 * Media Type:Memory Stick Duo; Memory Stick PRO Duo; Memory Stick PRO Duo(High Speed); Memory Stick PROHG Duo; Memory Stick Micro*6 ; Memory Stick Micro (Mark2)*6 ; SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card; microSD Memory Card*6; microSDHC Memory Card*6; Memory Stick XC-HG Duo; microSDXC Memory Card*6

 * Erase/Protect:Erase: Single / Select / Date / Folder, Protect: Single / Select / Date / Folder
